verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: claimed] [ARG1: not to watch CNN during a truly amazing tirade this morning on Fox & Friends] .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] claimed [ARGM-NEG: not] to [V: watch] [ARG1: CNN] [ARGM-TMP: during a truly amazing tirade this morning on Fox & Friends] .
